body: I can take rape and ntr. They're still light compared to amputee, scat, gore and whatever the fuck weird fetishes out there. People publicly whining about rape and ntr (or anything really) in fictions are either the haven't gone deep enough or need mental help to separate fiction and reality.

Personally art is 10/10
Color is black n white 5/10
Story is a soso. Some good some bad and other very fuck up 5/10
Overall  5/10 it could be better without the bullshit rape and abusment...
